Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly an example of love it or hate it, has I believe either you will Love it for what it and love Joe's one liners or you will hate the entirety of it with a strong dislike but you can not wish to skip any part of this lovey dovey excursion.
